After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Average response time to customer inquiries
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to respond to customer inquiries.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Time to Respond to Inquiries / Number of Inquiries

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of customer issues resolved on the first call.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Issues Resolved on First Call / Total Number of Calls) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures customers' satisfaction with how their inquiries are handled.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Inquiry Handling

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Number of inquiries resolved per agent
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the productivity of customer service agents.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Number of Inquiries Resolved / Total Number of Agents

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Quality of responses to customer inquiries
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures how well responses to customer inquiries meet quality standards.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Average Quality Rating of Responses to Inquiries

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Percentage of inquiries escalated to higher levels
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of inquiries that need to be escalated.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Inquiries Escalated / Total Number of Inquiries) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Accuracy of information provided in responses
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures how accurate the information provided to customers is.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Responses / Total Number of Responses) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve complex customer inquiries.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Time to Resolve Complex Inquiries / Number of Complex Inquiries

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve customer complaints.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Time to Resolve Complaints / Number of Complaints

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The percentage of complaints that are resolved.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Complaints Resolved / Total Number of Complaints) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with complaint resolution process
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures how satisfied customers are with the complaint resolution process.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Complaint Resolution Process

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of complaints that are repeated by the same customers.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Repeat Complaints / Total Number of Complaints) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of corrective actions taken to resolve complaints.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Effective Corrective Actions / Total Number of Corrective Actions) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Number of complaints resolved per agent
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the productivity of customer service agents in resolving complaints.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Number of Complaints Resolved / Total Number of Agents

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of complaints that are escalated to higher management levels.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Complaints Escalated / Total Number of Complaints) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures how well the procedures for handling complaints work.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Average Rating of Complaint Handling Procedures Effectiveness

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Average response time to service requests
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to respond to service requests.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Time to Respond to Service Requests / Number of Service Requests

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The percentage of service requests that are fulfilled.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Fulfilled Service Requests / Total Service Requests) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The total number of unfulfilled service requests.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Number of Unresolved Service Requests

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with service request process
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures how satisfied customers are with the service request process.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Service Request Process

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Percentage of service requests completed on time
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of service requests completed within the agreed timeframe.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Service Requests Completed on Time / Total Number of Service Requests) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve a service request.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Time to Resolve Service Requests / Number of Service Requests

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures how accurately service requests are handled.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Service Requests / Total Number of Service Requests) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Number of service requests per customer
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the average number of service requests made by each customer.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Number of Service Requests / Total Number of Customers

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve warranty claims.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Time to Resolve Warranty Claims / Number of Warranty Claims

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of warranty claims that are rejected.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Warranty Claims Rejected / Total Number of Warranty Claims) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to complete repairs.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Time Spent on Repairs / Number of Repairs

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Percentage of repairs covered under warranty
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of repairs that are covered under warranty.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Repairs Covered Under Warranty / Total Number of Repairs) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures customers' satisfaction with warranty services.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Warranty Service

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Warranty cost as a percentage of revenue
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the cost of warranty claims relative to revenue.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Total Warranty Costs / Total Revenue) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The total number of repairs that were repeated for the same issue.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Count of Repeat Repairs

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of warranty claims that are approved.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Approved Warranty Claims / Total Number of Warranty Claims) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to respond to billing inquiries.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Time to Respond to Billing Inquiries / Number of Billing Inquiries

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of billing.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Billings / Total Number of Billings) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve billing disputes.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Time to Resolve Billing Disputes / Number of Billing Disputes

After Sales+Customer Service.KPIS: Percentage of invoices paid on time
After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of invoices that are paid by the due date.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Invoices Paid on Time / Total Number of Invoices) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of billing errors.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Number of Billing Errors / Total Number of Bills Issued) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures how satisfied customers are with the billing support provided.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Billing Support

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to complete a billing cycle.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: Total Time from Invoice Creation to Payment Received / Number of Invoices

After Sales+Customer Service.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of outstanding invoices that are collected.
After Sales+Customer Service.FORMULA: (Total Amount Collected from Outstanding Invoices / Total Amount of Outstanding Invoices) * 100
